post.author: 이성기
post.content:
어느 정도 입력값을 주어야 하나요.. Win98, JDK1.41에서 수행해 보는데, 결과가 오락가락하네요...
C:\dev>java ArrayListVsVector 100000 Vector Processing Time:60 ArrayList Processing Time:0
C:\dev>java ArrayListVsVector 100000 Vector Processing Time:0 ArrayList Processing Time:60
C:\dev>java ArrayListVsVector 100000 Vector Processing Time:0 ArrayList Processing Time:50
C:\dev>java ArrayListVsVector 100000 Vector Processing Time:50 ArrayList Processing Time:0
C:\dev>java ArrayListVsVector 100000 Vector Processing Time:50 ArrayList Processing Time:0
C:\dev>java ArrayListVsVector 10000000 Vector Processing Time:820 ArrayList Processing Time:770
C:\dev>java ArrayListVsVector 10000000 Vector Processing Time:770 ArrayList Processing Time:770
C:\dev>java ArrayListVsVector 10000000 Vector Processing Time:770 ArrayList Processing Time:770
C:\dev>java ArrayListVsVector 10000000 Vector Processing Time:760 ArrayList Processing Time:710
C:\dev>java ArrayListVsVector 10000000 Vector Processing Time:820 ArrayList Processing Time:830
C:\dev>
post.title: twice faster...
